mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (chat_room_no, member_id, message, sent_at, is_read) VALUES (#{chatRoomNo}, #{memberId}, #{message}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_message SET is_read = 'Y' WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} AND is_read = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM chat_message WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} AND is_read = 'N'
